title: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not update immediately in the UI.
OB: The label height remains unchanged after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: The label height should adjust accordingly to accommodate the new font size.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open the UI where the label is displayed. 2. Modify the font size of the label. 3. Observe that the height of the label does not change to match the new font size.
